title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, November 5, 2020
description: It's the birthday of one of the original muckrakers, Ida Tarbell (1857-1944), whose investigatory reporting brought down Standard Oil.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of one of the original muckrakers, Ida Tarbell (1857-1944), whose investigatory reporting brought down Standard Oil.
